lead_paragraph: In an about-face, President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva called on President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad to send the woman convicted of adultery to Brazil.
snippet: In an about-face, President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva called on President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad to send the woman convicted of adultery to Brazil.

headline.main: Brazil’s President Offers Asylum to Woman Facing Stoning in Iran
headline.print_headline: Brazil’s President Offers Asylum to Woman Facing Stoning in Iran
